text: avarukku pin, ava(rava)r camukattinarukkut tutuvarkalai anuppivaittom; avarkalum telivana attatcikalai a(ccamukatta)varkalitam kontu vantarkal; eninum, munnar iruntavarkal enta (unmaiyaip) poyyenak kurik kontiruntarkalo, (anta unmaiyai) ivarkalum nampavillai - varampu mirum ittakaiyavarkalin nencankal mitu ivhvare nam muttiraiyitukirom
